fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
2d6 x10
1 Bard: 4d6 x10
2 Bards: 6d8 x10
3 Bards: 8d10 x10

Bards cost $200

fields.name: Drive-By:
fields.value: - If you pass this space and it is not owned, you gain a bardic inspiration die as detailed below.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Bardic Inspiration: When owned by you, you gain a bardic inspiration die every time you pass it. This die is a d6 and may be spent to add a d6 to your movement before you view the initial roll. You may only have one Bardic Inspiration Die at a time.
